text: Hello. I'm looking for example/reference when  invocation and query of the chain code is done from Java program (instead of command line or JS). Thank you!
<@U2DHRR4TE> `sudo` asks the system's super-user to 'do' the command for you, and in order to do so, it asks for your normal user password
so it's not a hyperledger consideration, but rather a Linux/Unix user administration one
<@U2DHRR4TE> , think it might be a node-gyp issue

attachments.title: Warning "root" does not have permission to access the dev dir  · Issue #454 · nodejs/node-gyp · GitHub
attachments.text: gyp WARN EACCES user "root" does not have permission to access the dev dir "/home/travis/.node-gyp/0.10.28" I'm filing this here because node-gyp is the only package that seems to throw this issue...
attachments.fallback: GitHub: Warning "root" does not have permission to access the dev dir  · Issue #454 · nodejs/node-gyp
